name: React Error Handling Analysis
description: Comprehensive analysis for React error handling implementation

steps.heading: Understanding request
steps.content: User asks about React error handling - requires comprehensive coverage of error boundaries, try-catch patterns, and best practices

steps.heading: Analyzing requirements
steps.content: Breaking down: error boundaries for component errors, async error handling, global error handling, and user experience considerations

steps.heading: Research & fact-checking
steps.content: Reviewing React documentation, community best practices, and modern error handling patterns in React 18+

steps.heading: Synthesizing information
steps.content: Combining research with practical implementation strategies, considering both development and production scenarios

steps.heading: Generating response
steps.content: Creating comprehensive response with code examples, error boundary implementation, and async error handling patterns

steps.heading: Quality verification
steps.content: Reviewing response for accuracy, completeness, and practical applicability. Ensuring code examples are production-ready

name: Dashboard Data Analysis
description: Analysis process for dashboard metrics and insights

steps.heading: Data ingestion
steps.content: Processing dashboard metrics, sentiment data, and performance indicators from multiple sources

steps.heading: Pattern recognition
steps.content: Identifying trends, anomalies, and correlations in the data across different time periods and segments

steps.heading: Contextual analysis
steps.content: Comparing current metrics with historical data, industry benchmarks, and competitor performance

steps.heading: Insight generation
steps.content: Formulating actionable insights and recommendations based on data patterns and business context

steps.heading: Response formulation
steps.content: Crafting clear, actionable recommendations with supporting data and visualization suggestions

name: Market Intelligence Processing
description: Comprehensive market analysis and competitive intelligence

steps.heading: Market scanning
steps.content: Collecting and processing market data, competitor activities, and industry trends from multiple sources

steps.heading: Competitive analysis
steps.content: Analyzing competitor positioning, market share changes, and strategic movements in the industry

steps.heading: Trend identification
steps.content: Identifying emerging trends, market opportunities, and potential threats based on data patterns

steps.heading: Strategic implications
steps.content: Evaluating the strategic implications of market changes and competitor actions for business strategy

steps.heading: Recommendation synthesis
steps.content: Synthesizing findings into actionable strategic recommendations and market positioning advice

steps.heading: Risk assessment
steps.content: Assessing potential risks and opportunities, providing confidence levels and implementation timelines
